summary: An in-depth look at The New York Times' long-time crossword puzzle editor Will Shortz and his loyal fan base.
cast: Will Shortz|Merl Reagle|Tyler Hinman|Trip Payne|Al Sanders|Ellen Ripstein|Jon Delfin|Jon Stewart|Ken Burns|Amy Ray|Emily Saliers|Daniel Okrent|Mike Mussina|Bob Dole|Bill Clinton|Miriam Raphael|Liane Hansen|Alex Ripitsky|Nancy Ellwood Fasulo|Marc Romano|Eileen Mogan|Patrick Jordan|Joy Dewing|Selmer Bringsjord|Brian Dominy|Vic Fleming|Stella Daily|Ben Tausig|Fred Piscop|Byron Walden|Amy Reynaldo|Kiran Kedlaya|Lloyd Mazer|Katherine Bryant|Jim Jenista|Dan Katz|Norma Mindell|Judie Berger|Leslie Billig|Doug Heller|Mel Rosen|Neal Conan|Stanley Newman|Susan Hoffman|Julia Royter|Chris Astoyan
title: Wordplay
